text: Hello to everyone at Jump Festa.

And everyone watching, hello! I'm Eiichiro Oda,
dual wielder of both back pain and stiff shoulders!

Well, this year has been a year of parties, starting with a 1000 chapter party of the manga, followed by a 100th volume party, and then a 1000 episode party of the anime. I hope you enjoyed the various projects. Did you enjoy it? We also had some announcements. The cast of the Hollywood live-action ONE PIECE was announced! It's perfect!
Those five guys are really good! The production is still moving forward slowly and carefully. And the movie
"RED"! Who's the girl? Shanks is still a mysterious character. What is his relationship with the girl? Is he going to meet Luffy? It's the first time that

Shanks will appear in a movie like this, right? He's coming out! I've been stopped from announcing anything, but I don't care, the one who speaks first wins! And next year is the 25th anniversary of the

manga! The people in charge of the manga are planning all sorts of things for it, so please enjoy it! As for the main story, I'm surprised that Wano-kuni isn't over yet, but anyway, Luffy! Please pay attention to the main character! I hope I can draw him well! I've been wanting to draw the last scene of Wano-kuni for a long time. Aaah! So, I'll be super excited about ONE PIECE next year. Please support me!!

He even made a pun to change his name from Oda Eiichiro (小田瑛一郎) to 小田谷翔平 (Odani Shohei). Note that Otani Shohei is a two-way baseball player from Japan who does pitching and hitting in MLB and became an MVP in American League this year.
